segments.text: I observe this indoor scene with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on the plate she's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water is gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the basin and overflowing onto everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle at her feet reflects the light from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, revealing a calm garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plants and a fence make it look inviting outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting focus, I see the open cabinet with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously balanced on a tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, pulling out cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her palm up, expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're collaborating in this little mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's legs are splayed awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
